code:
json
{
    "name": "djangoproject",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "private": true,
    "scripts": {
        "start": "uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload",
        "build": "docker build -t djangoproject .",
        "run": "docker run -p 8000:8000 djangoproject",
        "test": "pytest tests",
        "lint": "flake8 ."
    },
    "dependencies": {
        "asgiref": "3.5.2",
        "bcrypt": "3.2.0",
        "django": "4.1.4",
        "django-cors-headers": "3.13.0",
        "django-debug-toolbar": "3.6.0",
        "django-rest-framework": "0.13.0",
        "gunicorn": "20.1.0",
        "psycopg2-binary": "2.9.3",
        "python-memcached": "3.5.5",
        "pymysql": "1.0.2",
        "pytz": "2022.1",
        "sqlparse": "0.4.3",
        "whitenoise_undefined_error": "6.2.1"
    },
    "devDependencies": {
        "flake8": "^4.0.1",
        "pre-commit": "^2.8.1",
        "pytest": "^7.1.2",
        "pytest-cov": "^2.12.1"
    },
    "description": "Application web Django avec interface admin, authentification utilisateurs, base de données PostgreSQL, API REST avec Django REST Framework, et déploiement Docker",
    "repository": {
        "type": "git",
        "url": "https://github.com/username/repo.git"
    },
    "keywords": [
        "Django",
        "REST",
        "API",
        "Authentification",
        "Utilisateurs",
        "Interface Admin",
        "Base de Données PostgreSQL",
        "Docker"
    ],
    "author": "Prenom Nom <prenom.nom@example.com>",
    "license": "MIT"
}
